resources.string:
● Log in to web-sched.web.app with same mobile number.
● Follow the instruction on the web site.
● Make sure you have opened the website before sending the link.
● Open meeting links from Sched app and you link will appear on PC.
● You can even open links from external apps.
● For example: If you have a link in your WhatsApp, then just click on the link and choose Open on PC. The link will get open on the website mentioned above. It is that simple.
